https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iGlKdcPeMIDucrpzD7z08A4aZ0v.jpg Under the pretext of fighting terrorism or crime, the major powers have embarked on a dangerous race for surveillance technologies. Facial recognition cameras, emotion detectors, citizen rating systems, autonomous dronesâ€¦ A security obsession that in some countries is giving rise to a new form of political regime: numerical totalitarianism. Orwell's nightmare. Big Brother: A World Under Surveillance
